item.title: MySQL/MariaDB Command Line Cheatsheet
item.description: Connect to Database mysql [-h 192.168.1.100] -u USER_NAME -p [DATABASE_NAME] You’ll be prompted for the password. All commands inside the MySQL shell must end with ;. Common Commands SHOW TABLES; SHOW DATABASES; USE database_name; DESCRIBE table_name; SELECT * FROM table_name; Exit Press Ctrl+C or type exit;
